title: Please buff Zac
body: Zac being one of my favorite champions in the game seriously needs a buff. I miss when it was an ap tank but now its just a tank like sion but not even that tanky. If riot could increase the ap scalings of most his abilities that'd be great.

replies.body: Zac is totally fine bro his Ap ratio's aren't bad and his base damage are pretty high too.
Remove his AP scalings and replace them with Health based scaling and ZAC would be quite a lot more interesting and fun to play.
as a zac main, he doesnt need a buff. Hes strong as fuck
